cbinstall.description: Provides groups with a File Gallery to easily and quickly share files between one another.

param.name: groups_file_create_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Input number of files each individual user is limited to creating per group. If blank allow unlimited files. Moderators and group owners are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_file_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on group files. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_file_min_size
param.label: Minimum File Size
param.description: Input the minimum file size in KBs.

param.name: groups_file_max_size
param.label: Maximum File Size
param.description: Input the maximum file size in KBs. Set to 0 for no limit.

param.name: groups_file_extensions
param.label: File Types
param.description: Input the allowed file extensions as a comma separated list.

param.name: groups_file_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: groups_file_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed.

param.name: groups_file_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on rows.
